subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: A wide receiver for the University of Central Florida died after voluntary strength and conditioning drills, the day before spring practice was set to begin.The police said there was no obvious cause for the redshirt freshman Ereck Plancher’s late morning collapse. Keith Tribble, the university’s athletic director, said the players had been lifting weights, then ran for about 10 minutes. As everyone was leaving after the workout, Plancher took a knee in obvious distress, Tribble said. Trainers immediately provided C.P.R. and he was taken to the hospital by an ambulance.
